definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 7:22 engraver, writer, only in deriv. sense of one possessed of occult knowledge, diviner, astrologer, magician (prob. = [[ם]] + [[חֶרֶט]], v. Di Ol:§ 216, 5 Sta:§§ 295, 327 a)—only pl. abs. [[חַרְטֻמִּים]] Ge 41:24 + 4 t.; [[חַרְטֻמִּם]] Ex 8:15, Ex 9:11; cstr. [[חַרְטֻמֵּי]] Ge 41:8 + 2 t.;—
